title: For Sale Lot of 6 1907 Morgan Stationary Red Belt Cincinnati Postcard Lot

posts.post_title: For Sale Lot of 6 1907 Morgan Stationary Red Belt Cincinnati Postcard Lot
posts.post_content:
NO LONGER FOR SALE. Great Commentary on the back of the home run card. Free Shipping within the USA. PayPal or check in the mail accepted. Thank you Joe
